channel.title: Roger Goodell on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: NFL Chief Roger Goodell on Speculation Taylor Swift Could Be This Year’s Super Bowl Halftime Performer: “She Would Be Welcome at Any Time”
item.description: The Grammy-winning musician got engaged to Kansas City Chiefs’ tight end, Travis Kelce last month.

item.title: NFL Chief Roger Goodell on Speculation Taylor Swift Could Be This Year’s Super Bowl Halftime Performer: “She Would Be Welcome at Any Time”
item.description: The Grammy-winning musician got engaged to Kansas City Chiefs’ tight end, Travis Kelce last month.

item.title: NFL Employee “Seriously Injured” in New York Office Shooting, Security to Be Increased
item.description: Commissioner Roger Goodell, who updated the league’s staff Monday night, told employees they should work remotely on Tuesday.
